channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump raises India tariffs to 50% over Russian oil purchases

item.title: Sergeant ID'd as gunman who shot 5 soldiers at Fort Stewart in Georgia, Army says
item.description: Five soldiers were shot after an active shooter opened fire at Fort Stewart military base in east Georgia, the Army said.
